_sText:
Remade version of bhop_focus. Gameplay were unstable so heres another one that isnt as compact.

**Improvements**

• Smoother gameplay for speedrunning on both bhop categories
• Better lightning such as HDR and fixed dark levels
• Teleporters being straight forward
• New look with better fitting concrete textures
• No bad contrast on bhop pads 
• Cool particle system to make it more alive
• Bonus longer and improved
• Player clips above checkpoints should be fixed not to interrupt gameplay
• Filesize increased from 101 mb to 62 mb

The old map were made for the sake of the wall idea, so i thought i could make a decent gameplay into it and it would be fine. This map fits better as a speedrun map but still kept to a difficulty standard with a few obstacles as levels increases.
